short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Integrates D&D Beyond dice roles with dicerelay.com and other sites

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Send dice rolls from dndbeyond.com to dicerelay.com and other sites.

If you are already using dndbeyond as a DM or a player, this extension allows you to send dice rolls to any site with this extension enabled. dicerelay.com will also allow you to send dice rolls to Tabletop Simulator. 

If you are a Virtual Table Top (VTT) developer, this extension allows your site to start receiving dice rolls from dndbeyond, making it easier for your users to integrate your site with players' character sheets and the encounter builder.
